verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--'tomāra bhoṭa-kambala kothā gela?'
prabhu-pade saba kathā gosāñi kahila

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; tomāra—your; bhoṭa-kambala—woolen blanket; kothā gela—where did it go; prabhu-pade—unto the lotus feet of Lord Caitanya; saba—all; kathā—narration; gosāñi—Sanātana Gosvāmī; kahila—said.
translation: When Sanātana Gosvāmī returned, the Lord asked, "Where is your woolen blanket?" Sanātana Gosvāmī then narrated the whole story to the Lord.
